betterclouds.message.profiling.enabled: Enabled profiling over %d frames, performance will suffer.
betterclouds.message.gpuIncompatible: §c§l[!]§r Your GPU is not compatible with Better Clouds.
betterclouds.message.gpuPartiallyIncompa: §c§l[!]§r Your GPU is not fully compatible with Better Clouds. This might affect the game's performance and some features might not be available.
betterclouds.message.hwMaybeIncompatible: §c§l[!]§r Some users of Better Clouds have reported issues with your CPU / GPU Model (§o%s§r with §o%s§r).
betterclouds.message.generic.disable: Click here to disable this message
betterclouds.message.renderdoc.load.queu: RenderDoc will be loaded once you restart your game.
betterclouds.message.renderdoc.prompt.lo: click here to set it up.
betterclouds.config.title: Better Clouds Config
betterclouds.config.reset.tooltip.holdSh: Hold SHIFT and click to reset
betterclouds.config.entry.opacity.descri: The opacity of an individual cloud cube
The final opacity is scaled by this factor
betterclouds.config.entry.opacityExponen: Affects how quickly the maximum opacity is reached
betterclouds.config.entry.gamma.descript:
Affects the brightness and contrast
Negative values represent 1/γ
betterclouds.config.entry.sunriseStartTi: When the day brightness begins to have an effect
betterclouds.config.entry.sunriseEndTime: When the day brightness has full effect
betterclouds.config.entry.sunsetStartTim: When the night brightness begins to have an effect
When the night brightness has full effect
betterclouds.config.entry.tint.descripti: Adjusts the color of the clouds
betterclouds.config.entry.spacing.descri: Horizontal distance between individual cloud cubes
betterclouds.config.entry.randomPlacemen: Random offset to the individual cloud cubes
betterclouds.config.entry.yRange.descrip: Vertical distance between individual cloud cubes
betterclouds.config.entry.yOffset.descri: Adjusts the y level of the clouds
betterclouds.config.entry.travelSpeed.de: How fast the clouds travel across the sky
betterclouds.config.entry.windEffectFact: How much the size of individual cloud cubes changes dynamically
betterclouds.config.entry.windSpeedFacto: How fast the size of individual cloud cubes changes dynamically
betterclouds.config.entry.colorVariation: How much the color of individual cloud cubes changes dynamically
betterclouds.config.entry.celestialBodyH: A halo around the sun and moon, to simulate mie scattering
betterclouds.config.entry.chunkSize.desc: How many clouds are generated at once
betterclouds.config.entry.distance.descr: A factor of the regular view distance
betterclouds.config.entry.shuffle.descri: Can improve some visual issues and z-fighting
betterclouds.config.entry.sizeXZ.descrip: The width of an individual cloud cube
betterclouds.config.entry.sizeY.descript: The height of an individual cloud cube
betterclouds.config.entry.fadeEdge.descr: How far along the view distance clouds start to fade out
betterclouds.config.entry.fuzziness.desc: How well defined the outline of clouds are
betterclouds.config.entry.sparsity.descr: Removes this percentage of individual cloud cubes
betterclouds.config.entry.scaleFalloffMi: How big clouds appear at the edge of the view distance
betterclouds.config.entry.useIrisFBO.des: Don't turn this off unless you are experiencing crashes
betterclouds.config.entry.irisSupport.de: Render clouds when shaders are active
Render clouds regardless of the shader pack settings
betterclouds.config.entry.sunPathAngle.d: Tilt of the sun/moon rotation axis, for compatibility with shaders that support this option
betterclouds.config.entry.worldCurvature:
Enables world curvature and disables frustum culling.
§e§nNote:§r
If world curvature is enabled in your shader, but not in Better Clouds then you must manually disable 'Frustum Culling' in the 'Performance' settings.
betterclouds.config.entry.upscaleResolut: The resolution that is used for upscaling, for compatibility with shaders that support TAAU
betterclouds.config.text.shaders:
§4Shader support is experimental!§r
Some shaders work, others don't.
It's best to turn off the clouds in the shader pack settings or set them to 'vanilla' if that is an option.
You can play with the color settings below if the clouds don't look right.
betterclouds.config.entry.useVoxyViewDis: Uses voxy view distance to determine cloud rendering distance, has no effect if Voxy is not installed. If this is enabled and voxy is installed, the distance config has no effect.
